message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.
